title: Initial Monogram decorative frame font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415033913im_/http:/typophile.com/files/4_Z-300x300_3985.jpg)
  
Hi, I have searched and searched all day long for either the creator of this font/frame border, it's so extremely common and used by tons of crafters to create mostly vinyl decals for tiles or glass blocks. I desperately need to find it. Oh, btw, I'm not looking to know the font within the frame, just basically where can I find the whole thing.  
Thanks in advance for any help!  
Jen
